LTBR I dont know how it happened but some of you seem to have been deluded into thinking that the duty of a corporation is to its shareholders youre wrong the duty of the corporation is to the corporation some of you have this rather quaint notion that Seth Grae acts as some sort of fiduciary on your behalf I would have thought that you would have been cured of this brand of thinking by now
LTBR gather round as the dump begins in earnest

LTBR I think whatever catalyst exists thatll take this over 1 may not be hit til NEXT year which is beyond whats required by NASDAQ to avoid a reverse split I dont sense urgency on the parts of Nuscale a utility or the DOE to advance the fuel Seth has positioned himself to benefit regardless of how long it takes and in some ways the longer it takes the more he benefits though Im confident he wants LTBR to stay in business in one form or another As OwlIn pointed out their options are so far underwater it is not something they even factor into their compensation I am not seeing much incentive for them to avoid a reverse split or appetite to accelerate anything Its possible a milestone could be hit any day but the stock is not trading like it will The dilution and vague timelines dont point to that either Im surprised we are holding the 70 cent range and am not sure how much longer we will The GAIN voucher is the only solid step forward Ive seen but we need more

LTBR Roger Float Nuclear Fuel Strategy Commercial Manager at EDF Energy commented We welcome the opportunity to join NUFAB and provide our insight to Enfission given the unprecedented level of evolutionrevolution that fuel design is undergoing of which Lightbridge Fuel is such an important part Specifically there are a number of potential benefits the fuel could bring to the nuclear industry including improved economics power uprates longer fuel cycles as well as enhanced safety benefits I look forward to working closely with Enfission and the other members of NUFAB to contribute to the success of this fuel development program worldwide
